verses.verse: Again there was a <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3320>present<s%> themselves before the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H8432>among<s%> them to <S%H3320>present<s%> himself before the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H199>But<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> now, and <S%H5060>touch<s%> his <S%H6106>bone<s%> and his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and he will <S%H1288>curse<s%> thee to thy <S%H6440>face<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, Behold, he is in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>; but <S%H8104>save<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%>.

¶ So <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> with <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H7822>boils<s%> from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of his <S%H7272>foot<s%> unto his <S%H6936>crown<s%>.

In all this did not <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips<s%>.

¶ Now when <S%H347>Job's<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> that was <S%H935>come<s%> upon him, they <S%H935>came<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> from his own <S%H4725>place<s%>; <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%>, and <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%>, and <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%>: for they had made an <S%H3259>appointment<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5110>mourn<s%> with him and to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> him.

So they sat <S%H3427>down<s%> with him upon the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>, and none <S%H1696>spake<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> unto him: for they <S%H7200>saw<s%> that his <S%H3511>grief<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%>.
